content.text: New features and improvements have been introduced to the ElizaOS framework through several plugin updates. These include a cryptocurrency arbitrage plugin, token security analysis plugin, Mind Network integration, and a Moralis plugin for Solana API access.
Arbitrage Plugin for Eliza that enables cryptocurrency trading across DEXs, integration with Flashbots, supports multiple DEX pairs like Uniswap V2.
Security-focused updates with the new quick intel plugin for token analysis.
The Moralis plugin now integrates with Solana APIs providing features like aggregated stats and token metadata access.

Cryptocurrency markets today saw significant movements: Bitcoin surged by 10.93% landing at $104,692 per coin while Ethereum jumped 32.91% reaching $3,330.07. Solana experienced a moderate rise of 4.22% to $256.16.
Ai16z token experienced a 9.26% increase now priced at $0.8786.

Addressed multiple critical bugs including name parsing bugs in the Twitter client-homeTimeline and a fix for topics formatting bug at composeState. Resolved numerous conflicts and performed merges with active branches.
Twitter client bug where the API was incorrectly parsing name fields has been fixed.
Topics formatting bug fix was applied to improve state composition reliability.
